title: A Paradoxical Racer: Thibaut Pinot Gave Us Everything
content:
The Frenchman, who retired after Il Lombardia, raced with his heart and won fans with his never-say-die approach to racing.

Read the full article at A Paradoxical Racer: Thibaut Pinot Gave Us Everything on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
